abstract: How to create a campaign projecting confidence in Washington Mutual, to be remembered as having suffered the largest bank failure of its time?
snippet: How to create a campaign projecting confidence in Washington Mutual, to be remembered as having suffered the largest bank failure of its time?
lead_paragraph: It was a daunting task for any ad agency copywriter. In the last 10 days of the life of Washington Mutual  Sept. 15 to Sept. 25  terrified customers withdrew $17 billion in deposits from the failing savings and loan, which federal regulators then took over and sold to JPMorgan Chase for $1.9 billion.

headline.main: Ads That Soothe When Banks Are Failing
headline.print_headline: Marketing Campaigns Aim to Soothe Clients When Banks Are Failing
